projects

A growing collection of some of my projects...

COVID-19 Dashboard

COVID-19 dashboard with interactive visualization and analysis on global data.

AI for COVID-19 diagnosis

COVID-19 prediction through cough audio using deep-learning (hosted on AWS EC2).

Attention model JPN -> ENG

Japanese to English translator using encoder-decoder model with attention.

AI image colorizer

Colorizing black and white images using deep-learning (hosted on AWS EC2)

Google Quest Q&A labelling

Implementation of Transformers on a NLP dataset by Google (Kaggle competition).

Mercari Price Suggestion challenge

Solving Mercari price suggestion challenge on kaggle using only linear models.

Solving sudoku using Artificial Intelligence

AI-powered sudoku solver using a simple Convolutional Neural Network.

AI-powered Indian license plate detector

Detecting Indian license plates using a simple Convolutional Neural Network.

Hand gesture translator

Hand gesture to Emoji translator using custom CNN model and YOLOv3.

Netflix - Global shows

Netflix show Genre prediction using transformers (Interactive EDA also).
